combat1.name: Golden Blade's Petaled Touch
combat1.descriptionRaw:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to 4 rapid strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.
combat1.description:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 4 rapid strikes.

Charged Attack
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

combat2.name: Heaven and Earth Made Manifest
combat2.descriptionRaw:
Summoning a shadow of her former powers, she switches to the {LINK#N11260001}<color=#FFD780FF>Lunar Phase Shift</color>{/LINK} mode.
In this mode, Zibai's Normal Attacks and Charged Attacks will deal <color=#FFE699FF>Geo DMG</color> that cannot be overridden by other infusions, and she can accrue special <color=#FFD780FF>Phase Shift Radiance</color> through different methods. Zibai can consume Phase Shift Radiance to unleash the special Elemental Skill <color=#FFD780FF>Spirit Steed's Stride</color>.

<color=#FFD780FF>Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam</color>
While in the <color=#FFD780FF>Lunar Phase Shift</color> mode, when Zibai performs Normal Attacks, the fourth attack will deal an additional instance of <color=#FFE699FF>Geo DMG</color>, which is considered Lunar-Crystallize Reaction DMG.
combat2.description:
Summoning a shadow of her former powers, she switches to the **Lunar Phase Shift** mode.
In this mode, Zibai's Normal Attacks and Charged Attacks will deal Geo DMG that cannot be overridden by other infusions, and she can accrue special Phase Shift Radiance through different methods. Zibai can consume Phase Shift Radiance to unleash the special Elemental Skill Spirit Steed's Stride.

Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam
While in the Lunar Phase Shift mode, when Zibai performs Normal Attacks, the fourth attack will deal an additional instance of Geo DMG, which is considered Lunar-Crystallize Reaction DMG.

labels: Lunar Phase Shift Charged Attack DMG|{param11:F1P}+{param12:F1P} DEF
Lunar Phase Shift 4-Hit Additional DMG|{param3:F1P} DEF

combat3.name: Tri-Sphere Eminence
combat3.descriptionRaw:
Zibai operates the Jadelight Canopy, dealing two instances of <color=#FFE699FF>Geo DMG</color>, with the second damage instance being considered Lunar-Crystallize Reaction DMG.
When cast, if Zibai is in the {LINK#N11260001}<color=#FFD780FF>Lunar Phase Shift</color>{/LINK}, the duration of the current Lunar Phase Shift will extend by an additional 1.7s.
combat3.description:
Zibai operates the Jadelight Canopy, dealing two instances of Geo DMG, with the second damage instance being considered Lunar-Crystallize Reaction DMG.
When cast, if Zibai is in the **Lunar Phase Shift**, the duration of the current Lunar Phase Shift will extend by an additional 1.7s.

passive1.name: The Selenic Adeptus Descends
passive1.descriptionRaw: When casting the Elemental Skill <color=#FFD780FF>{LINK#S11262}Heaven and Earth Made Manifest{/LINK}</color>, or when nearby party members trigger Moondrift Harmony, Zibai gains the <color=#FFD780FF>Selenic Descent</color> effect for 4s: The DMG dealt by the 2nd hit of {LINK#N11260001}<color=#FFD780FF>Spirit Steed's Stride</color>{/LINK} is increased by 60% of Zibai's DEF.
passive1.description: When casting the Elemental Skill **Heaven and Earth Made Manifest**, or when nearby party members trigger Moondrift Harmony, Zibai gains the Selenic Descent effect for 4s: The DMG dealt by the 2nd hit of **Spirit Steed's Stride** is increased by 60% of Zibai's DEF.

passive2.name: Layered Peaks Pierce the Clouds
passive2.descriptionRaw: Other <color=#FFE699FF>Geo</color> party members increase Zibai's DEF by 15% each. <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro</color> party members increase her Elemental Mastery by 60 each.
passive2.description: Other Geo party members increase Zibai's DEF by 15% each. Hydro party members increase her Elemental Mastery by 60 each.

passive3.name: Moonsign Benediction: The Coursing Sun and Moon
passive3.descriptionRaw:
When a party member triggers a Hydro Crystallize reaction, it will be converted into the Lunar-Crystallize reaction, with every 100 DEF that Zibai has increasing Lunar-Crystallize's Base DMG by 0.7%, up to a maximum of 14%.

Additionally, when Zibai is in the party, the party's <color=#FFD780FF>Moonsign</color> will increase by 1 level.
passive3.description:
When a party member triggers a Hydro Crystallize reaction, it will be converted into the Lunar-Crystallize reaction, with every 100 DEF that Zibai has increasing Lunar-Crystallize's Base DMG by 0.7%, up to a maximum of 14%.

Additionally, when Zibai is in the party, the party's Moonsign will increase by 1 level.

passive4.name: Moonlit Flower Forest
passive4.descriptionRaw:
At night (18:00 – 06:00), when not in combat, restore 1 Elemental Energy to Zibai every 2 seconds.
This effect does not work in Domains, Trounce Domains, or the Spiral Abyss.
